location_machine_xrefs.condition: 5-31-19 Right flipper needs rebuilding. It doesn't always return to the down position but if you hit the left flipper it usually unsticks the right. The machine is playable but tending to the wonky flipper makes things difficult when you have multi ball going.

machine_conditions.comment: 5-31-19 Right flipper needs rebuilding. It doesn't always return to the down position but if you hit the left flipper it usually unsticks the right. The machine is playable but tending to the wonky flipper makes things difficult when you have multi ball going.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Machine plays well. Be sure to check that the ball is seated correctly before plunging. Typically I have to pull the plunger before it ejects the ball or bump it gently to get the ball all the way back to plunge properly.

name: Oasis Arcade Airbnb
description: Arcade-themed AirBnB with 22 pinball and 20+ arcade games! Stay in our tiny-house & have 24/7 access to our arcade (all games are on freeplay!) and use our saltwater pool too! Find us on airbnb by searching tinyhouse & arcade in lithia springs Georgia.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is the game that started it all for me! I used to dog-sit my neighbor's 2 dogs when he would go away. He went away often & had a sky jump in his kitchen! I used to play that game hours upon hours by myself and with friends that would come over. Great memories so I'm happy to have this game in our collection.

machine_conditions.comment: This is the game that started it all for me! I used to dog-sit my neighbor's 2 dogs when he would go away. He went away often & had a sky jump in his kitchen! I used to play that game hours upon hours by myself and with friends that would come over. Great memories so I'm happy to have this game in our collection.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a really fun, unique game that you won't see out in the wild very often. I believe they were only about 500 of these made and they're super hard to find for sale these days. I bought this one at an auction in San Diego and had it shipped to Pookie's pinballs where Perry restored it for us. We've got about $3,000 into this game and it's a keeper.

machine_conditions.comment: This is a really fun, unique game that you won't see out in the wild very often. I believe they were only about 500 of these made and they're super hard to find for sale these days. I bought this one at an auction in San Diego and had it shipped to Pookie's pinballs where Perry restored it for us. We've got about $3,000 into this game and it's a keeper.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a really fun game to play! It has a unique feature where all the lights go out on the game except for three black light fixtures During certain times in the game. I bought a set of new glow-in-the-dark balls. During multi-ball the glow-in-the-dark balls appear to float across the Playfield as they luminesce. I think they made around 1,700 of these. We bought it for $1800 this year and it needed some love. It plays awesome and looks really nice

machine_conditions.comment: This is a really fun game to play! It has a unique feature where all the lights go out on the game except for three black light fixtures During certain times in the game. I bought a set of new glow-in-the-dark balls. During multi-ball the glow-in-the-dark balls appear to float across the Playfield as they luminesce. I think they made around 1,700 of these. We bought it for $1800 this year and it needed some love. It plays awesome and looks really nice

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is another game that doesn't get a lot of love from the pinball Community but is an absolute blast to play. It used to be a fairly cheap game but prices are nearing $2,000 for this title nowadays. I love Gottlieb games from this era. There's so kitschy and Goofy that they play smile on your face while playing.

machine_conditions.comment: This is another game that doesn't get a lot of love from the pinball Community but is an absolute blast to play. It used to be a fairly cheap game but prices are nearing $2,000 for this title nowadays. I love Gottlieb games from this era. There's so kitschy and Goofy that they play smile on your face while playing.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: 1 owner, HUO, beautiful condition. Traded Avatar and $750 for it.

machine_conditions.comment: 1 owner, HUO, beautiful condition. Traded Avatar and $750 for it.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a fun game to play against someone. It's okay to play along but it's way more fun to compete. This is the second slugfest I've had the first one I sold and then realized what a cool game it was. So, I bought another one.

machine_conditions.comment: This is a fun game to play against someone. It's okay to play along but it's way more fun to compete. This is the second slugfest I've had the first one I sold and then realized what a cool game it was. So, I bought another one.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a rare redemption game with no flippers. It's one of a hundred or so made. It is quite boring to play.

machine_conditions.comment: This is a rare redemption game with no flippers. It's one of a hundred or so made. It is quite boring to play.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: They only made 477 of these unique gamed. It's considered the best cocktail table by many. It was produced by Gottlieb and has a 2 ball multi ball with great sounds and call-outs

machine_conditions.comment: They only made 477 of these unique gamed. It's considered the best cocktail table by many. It was produced by Gottlieb and has a 2 ball multi ball with great sounds and call-outs

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I was hooked on this TV show throughout my childhood. When I started collecting pinball I found out there was a Gilligan's Island game and I had to find one! They're very hard to find in good condition but I got lucky and this one is just great! It's probably my favorite pinball game in our collection.

machine_conditions.comment: I was hooked on this TV show throughout my childhood. When I started collecting pinball I found out there was a Gilligan's Island game and I had to find one! They're very hard to find in good condition but I got lucky and this one is just great! It's probably my favorite pinball game in our collection.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a very rare game. They only made 53 of them. It is a flipperless redemption game that is honestly quite boring to play but it is rare and it is pinball, so I keep it!

machine_conditions.comment: This is a very rare game. They only made 53 of them. It is a flipperless redemption game that is honestly quite boring to play but it is rare and it is pinball, so I keep it!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: We bought this machine a year-and-a-half ago for $1,200. It was working and in pretty nice shape. I shopped it and finished putting LED bulbs in it. It does not get a lot of love from the pinball community but many of our guests choose this as one of their favorite pinball games in our collection. It's a lot of fun to play!

machine_conditions.comment: We bought this machine a year-and-a-half ago for $1,200. It was working and in pretty nice shape. I shopped it and finished putting LED bulbs in it. It does not get a lot of love from the pinball community but many of our guests choose this as one of their favorite pinball games in our collection. It's a lot of fun to play!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a really fun game to play with its shaker motor and multi-ball and video modes. The game is in awesome huo condition and plays really well.

machine_conditions.comment: This is a really fun game to play with its shaker motor and multi-ball and video modes. The game is in awesome huo condition and plays really well.
This is a really fun game to play with a shaker motor and awesome multi-ball modes.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This game has almost a cult like following because of its kitschy theme and artwork. It's really a fun game that's super fast and a blast to play with the upper and lower play fields, hidden loop, flex save flippers and ramps that raise and lower automatically.

machine_conditions.comment: This game has almost a cult like following because of its kitschy theme and artwork. It's really a fun game that's super fast and a blast to play with the upper and lower play fields, hidden loop, flex save flippers and ramps that raise and lower automatically.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: this game is in awesome condition. It is quite rare in that only a 103 were made. It has auto plunge and some really fun call outs and lighting. It's surprisingly fun even for adults. It is nearly impossible to find this game on location for public play.

machine_conditions.comment: this game is in awesome condition. It is quite rare in that only a 103 were made. It has auto plunge and some really fun call outs and lighting. It's surprisingly fun even for adults. It is nearly impossible to find this game on location for public play.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: My partner & I played this game a lot on the computer back in the early 2000's. We were happy to find a beautiful huo example in knoxville to add to our collection. I spent a good 20 hours  going through this and making it perfect  again. Now, we can try to relive some of the old college days spent playing RollerCoaster Tycoon on the computer but on a pinball game instead!

machine_conditions.comment: My partner & I played this game a lot on the computer back in the early 2000's. We were happy to find a beautiful huo example in knoxville to add to our collection. I spent a good 20 hours  going through this and making it perfect  again. Now, we can try to relive some of the old college days spent playing RollerCoaster Tycoon on the computer but on a pinball game instead!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I picked this up from a retired marine Veteran on 5/30/19 in Newnan Ga. for $2000. It's in beautiful condition even though it was likely routed and has over 23k total games played. It's a rare game that you won't see in public often. We think it's a keeper here at the oasis arcade airbnb! Come play it soon.

machine_conditions.comment: I picked this up from a retired marine Veteran on 5/30/19 in Newnan Ga. for $2000. It's in beautiful condition even though it was likely routed and has over 23k total games played. It's a rare game that you won't see in public often. We think it's a keeper here at the oasis arcade airbnb! Come play it soon.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a rare game to see on location because they only made about 450 of them. It's not exactly a pinball game but it's still loads of fun shooting little basketballs into a little hoop that moves backwards and forwards. It's basically a slugfest for basketball fans.

machine_conditions.comment: This is a rare game to see on location because they only made about 450 of them. It's not exactly a pinball game but it's still loads of fun shooting little basketballs into a little hoop that moves backwards and forwards. It's basically a slugfest for basketball fans.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Players quality game - bought on 10/19 for $1300 - plays well.

machine_conditions.comment: Players quality game - bought on 10/19 for $1300 - plays well.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is a fun Stern game from 2006. It is the 2nd World Poker Tour we've owned. I sold the first one and then realize how fun it is. We got lucky and found a home use only game in beautiful condition for $3,100. I shopped it out made it perfect and now we will keep this for a long time. It's a fast playing, exciting game that many of our guests love.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I bought this from S.Gentry for $4500 on 7/6/19. It came from S.Kurkian then went to Berto & S.G. and eventually made its way to us. Currently, it is our newest pinball game.

machine_conditions.comment: I bought this from S.Gentry for $4500 on 7/6/19. It came from S.Kurkian then went to Berto & S.G. and eventually made its way to us. Currently, it is our newest pinball game.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Riot shot does not register at all, wiring is set to think inner right lane is the outline, right pop does not pop under any circumstance, tower does not register, both coin slots eat quarters periodically. Found a tick crawling inside the dirty playfield. Absolutely do not recommend playing as the owner clearly does not maintain and this is among the worst tables I‚Äôve ever seen based on my five years playing pinball.
